pullRequest.title: Expose the 'java.import.gradle.java.home' preference
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes redhat-developer/vscode-java#1536
Requires redhat-developer/vscode-java#1541
Signed-off-by: Snjezana Peco snjezana.peco@redhat.com

nodes.bodyText:
if (gradleJavaHomeChanged || hasAllowedChecksumsChanged(oldPreferences, newPreferences))
no need to compute checksum changes if we already know we need to bail
